item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (418 points | 223 comments)
2. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (200 points | 37 comments)
3. Barlow's Principles of Adult Behaviour (21 points | 7 comments)
4. An end to all this prostate trouble? (378 points | 170 comments)
5. Robot Dexterity Still Seems Hard (9 points | 2 comments)
6. Stuffed-Na(a)N: stuff your NaNs (64 points | 32 comments)
7. LLMs can see and hear without any training (120 points | 43 comments)
8. Thank you for holding my duck (2021) (39 points | 12 comments)
9. Cloth (369 points | 44 comments)
10. Fifteen new giant radio galaxies discovered with ASKAP (27 points | 1 comment)
11. I wrote a book called "Crap Towns". It seemed funny at the time (341 points | 249 comments)
12. University of Waterloo withholds coding contest results over suspected AI use (39 points | 32 comments)
13. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (183 points | 194 comments)
14. Berkeley Humanoid Lite – Open-source robot (231 points | 24 comments)
15. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (604 points | 326 comments)
16. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (124 points | 27 comments)
17. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (387 points | 109 comments)
18. Wikipedia’s nonprofit status questioned by D.C. U.S. attorney (772 points | 706 comments)
19. Freshpaint (YC S19) is hiring back end and front end engineers (Remote, US only) ( | hide)
20. The Friendship Recession: The Lost Art of Connecting (261 points | 189 comments)
21. World Emulation via Neural Network (226 points | 39 comments)
22. Parallel ./configure (180 points | 137 comments)
23. The NNCPNET Email Network (16 points | 3 comments)
24. Eurorack Knob Idea (310 points | 110 comments)
25. Show HN: Formalizing Principia Mathematica using Lean (171 points | 32 comments)
26. Reproducibility project fails to validate dozens of biomedical studies (248 points | 116 comments)
27. Avoiding skill atrophy in the age of AI (289 points | 284 comments)
28. Show HN: I used OpenAI's new image API for a personalized coloring book service (287 points | 162 comments)
29. A $20k American-made electric pickup with no paint, no stereo, no screen (1344 points | 1178 comments)
30. Your phone isn't secretly listening to you, but the truth is more disturbing (155 points | 119 comments)
